name: Nucci's Bake A Deli
text:
Nucci's Bake A Deli Sandwich Menu Transcription
STEP 1 - CHOOSE A NUMBER OR YOUR OWN MEATS STEP 2 - CHOOSE YOUR BUN - CASALINGO OR KAISER STEP 3 - CHOOSE YOUR CHEESE, TOPPINGS & DRESSING

#1 - ITALIAN CLASSIC Regular Mortadella Prosciutto

#2 - COLD CUT COMBO Turkey Ham Roast Beef

#3 - SPICY ITALIAN Hot Mortadella Mild Genoa Salami Hot Capocollo

#4 - NUCCI'S SPECIAL Hot Calabrese Salami Black Forest Ham

#5 - STAFF FAVORITE Rosemary Ham Smoked Turkey

#6 - THE GODFATHER Mild Regular Capocollo Prosciutto Salami Tuscany Ham

BUN OPTIONS CASALINGO KAISER

CHEESE Cheddar - Mild Cheddar - Medium Cheddar - Old Havarti - Dill Havarti - Regular Havarti - Jalapeño Marble Mozzarella Provolone Swiss

DRESSINGS Balsamic Glaze Mayonnaise Mustard Ranch

HOT DRESSINGS Chipotle Hot Sauce La Bomba Spread

TOPPINGS Cucumber Lettuce Onions Olives - Black Olives - Green Pickles Roasted Red Peppers Tomato

HOT TOPPINGS Antipasto Calabrese Banana Peppers Eggplant Jalapeño
